entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
